title: An Act to add sex and gender as protected classes for crime prosecutions

abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Rausch, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1246) of Rebecca L. Rausch and William N. Brownsberger for legislation relative to the addition of sex and gender as a protected class category for crime prosecutions.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/25/2025 from 10:00 AM-05:00 PM in A-2

Hearing rescheduled to 11/25/2025 from 10:00 AM-04:00 PM in A-2                                                                                                                                                                             and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time

Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means
